pages.text: The Rotor is the most important component of your Turbine as its design will have a direct impact on the energy production of the Turbine.$(br2)A Rotor is built using four types of blocks:$(li)a single $(l:bigreactors:turbine/part-rotorbearing)Rotor Bearing$(/l)$(li)some $(l:bigreactors:turbine/part-rotorshaft)Rotor Shaft$(/l) blocks$(li)a number of $(l:bigreactors:turbine/part-rotorblade)Rotor Blades$(/l)$(li)a single $(l:bigreactors:turbine/part-casing)Housing$(/l) block
$(bold)Building the Rotor$()$(br2)The Rotor can be build following any of the three axis
